TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CorrelationDataMessageProperty extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty

summary.span: 提供一个消息属性，该属性将会随着协议的应用（例如，通过传入信息从 返回数据时）累积消息的其他相关信息。

span.span: Provides a message property that accumulates additional correlation information for a message as protocols are applied, such as when data is returned from a over the incoming message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在计算用于将消息关联到其他消息的实例键时， 累积的相关数据将会增加消息内容。The correlation data accumulated by the augments the message contents when calculating instance keys that relate messages to other messages.
